title: EXCELLENT!
desc: I cannot emphasise on how amazing the staff and the food is! Staff are very pleasant and very attentive to our needs. They also have a huge variety of food that taste absolutely delicious. I will visit here the next time again!

title: A comfort stay during the peak season!
desc: It is lucky to stay at this hotel with very convenient location during the Formula One Tournament from 15 to 17 September 2023. Just 3 minutes walk to the nearby convenient store located inside a petrol station, 12 minutes to a shopping mall and the nearest MRT station. The most impressive one is that there is a 24-hours cooked food stall within 10-minute walk. The hotel is clean and tidy.

title: Short stay with Aqueen
desc: Stay was great, hotel is very convenient and close to nearby amenities(shopping mall,mrt station and many more). Not my first time coming here. Always enjoy my stay here definitely with the warm welcome from the front of house staff. Thank you Aqueen PayarLebar for the wonderful hospitality.

title: Cheap but quality rooms!
desc: Booked a room on the day of. Hotel room was really lovely albeit small but comfortable! The tv doesn't have cable and the bed was a little uncomfortable but it was alright. Our room had a balcony with chairs but for some reason it was locked and front desk confirmed that it was supposed to be locked. Receptionist at check in was friendly and was patient with us when my friend could not find her ic for a minute and even suggested alternative ways such as using singpass app to check in. Overall it was a pleasant stay with no complaints.

title: Good stay
desc: Clean rooms, friendly staff. Stayed during may 2023 and the staff at the front office was super friendly and accommodating. Check in process is smooth. Took the lift up to my room and was pleasantly surprised at the clean condition of the room!

title: Good access to the MRT and Restaurants
desc: The hotel is clean and housekeeping can provide an iron and ironing board, which is good. The hotel is close to the MRT and there is a great choice of food and shops nearby. Depending on the room you get, there can be some noise from the "superbike "riders outside. There is not much choice on the TV, which is needed to drown out the noisy Chinese who shout to each other in the corridors, as soon as they arrive and depart.

title: Excellent services, with class in hygiene & safety.
desc: Staff is very polite & professional, no need to followup requested service. I stayed there amidst COVID-19, I was really worried about precautions to avoid from get infected. But they had maintained good hygiene practices including temperature screening & sanitizers. Also enjoyed breakfast... its delicious with multiple choices.

title: Good stay
desc: I booked this hotel for 6 hours dayuse only. I arrived early and with reasonable increase, I got room earlier so I stayed for 8 hours. The staff upgraded my room which had more space. It was clean and bathroom was spacious with all toiletries provided. Once I entered and switched on the AC, the room cooled at fast rate which was good. There is a Shell petrol pump 50 m away for small convenience shopping. I did not go around much but I ordered food and taxi using Grab which was convenient. Taxi fare from airport was around 19 SGD. Overall I had good stay.

title: Great Staycation
desc: Overall it great stay for me and my wife, we check in late midnight, fast response by the front desk name by shidah if i not wrong, small room but it fine for us to stay, the room was clean and tidy, thanks q so much Aqueen Hotel Paya Lebar, will come back again surely

title: 1st time at Petite Menu review
desc: Went to Peitite Menu Paya Lebar today to have our family weekend lunch at abt 12noon. It was our first time there so we purchased fave vouchers x 4 to try the food out. Upon entering the cafe, we randomly picked a small table for 4 pax as we have 2 adults and 2 kids. A middle-aged be-spectacled chinese waiting staff came to us and "suggested" we move to a longer table (8 seater row) but I didn't want to take up a bigger space just in case the lunch crowd were to come in, so I politely turned him down. He started to show some impatience as if we were trying to be difficult so we moved to the longer table. Nobody came to us for the 1st ten mins until I waived a few times before a Malay staff, also middle-aged guy came to take our order. Frankly, he already showed some

title: Lovely stay
desc: Staff was friendly. Gave me a free comp upgrade to Premier. Premier room is nice which have bath tub. The room is small but clean. The bad thing is shopping mall is far . Will recommend this hotel to every one

title: Very small rooms
desc: The rooms are tiny. There is no space for your luggage or anything, its meant for one person only. You bump into the walls. The bathroom is really small as well. They need to do a deep clean as the bathroom had lots of mold in both the shower tiles and the sink. It is near the MRT a short walk that leads to the malls so there is shopping and food options. Overall its average but would not stay as its too small.

title: Affordable Hotel in Singapore
desc: Stayed in this hotel for a week with my family. I was not expecting too much from it before but after staying here, I can say that the price is still reasonable and affordable. I can still say that this hotel is still preferable to stay compared to the low end hotels. The place is clean and room servicr is good in maintaining the rooms. Area is near the MRT where lots of places to eat and shop as well (Paya Lebar Square, Singapore Post). The only minus for me is that since the rooms are closer together, the noise of banging of the doors from other neighbours can be heard. Anything else is still good and reasonable.

title: Tiny Room, Busted Shower
desc: This is a backdated review from my stay in Aug 2022, but I stayed here for 4 days, 3 nights. Stayed here for a work trip along with my wife and found the room to be really tiny, aircon was either really cold or really hot. Found myself waking up in the middle of the night to either turn on or off the air con, there was no in between even if i set it to 24-26 degrees. On top of that, the shower was pretty much broken, and water pressure was nothing and dripping down the cord. But what left the bad taste in our mouth was the attitude from the front desk when we requested an extra towel. There is one specific lady who has a real attitude problem. Can't remember her name but I'm sure I'm not the only complaint this staff had. Wifi/Internet was good and fast though, only

title: Very good
desc: Th soundproof of room is not so good, it will be better to improve the soundproof. I can easily hear the sound of water flow of next room. The counter staff is very kind and provide the considerate answer for the customer.

title: Typical Singapore Chain Hotel
desc: Reception was OK. No porter to help with our luggage. Had to ask for a trolley which had flat tyres. The room is nice. Beds are comfortable. Bath was a nice touch. However the bathroom floor floods when showering. Not a fan of the shower being in the bath due to mobility issues and it only has a shower curtain. Miserable cheap Charlies only have 6 local TV channels with only 1 having some English language shows and the rest in Chinese. Not acceptable when they have foriegn guests. A lot of noisey guests that seem to think they need to have loud conversations in the hallway at night. Room servicing is poor. Asked for servicing at 9am, still nothing by 1pm. The hotel is in a good location for public transport and shopping malls with food courts.

title: Good hotel stay
desc: The staffs and the environment is very pleasant. They do room cleaning daily as per my request. Free parking but they don't have any kitchen. Luckily there is a petrol station next door which sell day to day needs. Overall it's a good hotel for those who has tight budget.

title: Nice clean room, but toilet need improvements
desc: The good things about this hotel is the room cleanliness. The location is about 8 mins walk away from Paya Lebar MRT Station. There is free parking available too. The staffs were quite helpful when I complained the hot water is not functioning. However, the toilet bath tub design need some serious improvements. After a single bath, the whole toilet floor is flooded. The tiles supporting the bath tub should be higher than the bath tub so that the water will not flow out to floor. I have put the curtain inside the bath tub, but still the water managed to escaped from the bath tub. Hopefully the management will take note on this issue.

title: Good and clean Room but very tiny when compared to other properties
desc: I stayed in this hotel two days with my family Pros. Walkable to bus station and MRT station Many restaurants available in the nearest mall including indian restaurant. it is just 400mts from hotel Room is clean and have window in Deluxe Category Room. Nearest to international airport Staff is good and helpful. Cons Room Size is very small when compare to other hotels on this price category. Queen size bed provided on Delux room so its difficult to sleep along with kid Far away from all the attractions and tourist spots so every time you have to take Grab for which you have to shell out Minimum 10 to 25$ based on peak time but you can also consider the Bus or MRT. Bathroom is very small.

title: Disappointed Services
desc: Incident Occurred: On 30th Jan'22, around midnight, after my shower, I was trapped in the bathroom for almost an hour, without my mobile phone with me, to contact the receptionist for assistance. There was no emergency button or telephone installed in the bathroom for EMERGENCY USAGE. My anxiety increased leading to difficulties in breathing, after all my attempts in banging the bathroom door and screaming for help failed. Unsure if my next room neighbour assisted in contacting the receptionist, but an hour later the Hotel Staff assisted me out from the bathroom. As I was giving my feedback to the Hotel Staff on installing emergency devices in the bathrooms, they did not even listened or apologized but walked off immediately while I was still communicating with them. Truly a

title: Nice hotel and helpful staff
desc: It was my second stay at Aqueen PayaLebar Singapore. I love this hotel. How strategic location: close to some malls and MRT station just walk away.it is a quiet hotel ensure you will have comfort sleep, and nice breakfast. I was very lucky, the hotel offered me the very best room that they have, just because i made a little complaint on the room smell that i should stay originally. Thanks for the reception staff for the assistance. So helpful and swift solution than i expected. Very appreciated. Will stay on the next Singapore visit.

title: Love the Balcony
desc: Room is clean, it's small but with a spacious balcony then it's perfect! we Like the balcony very much. Bed and everything are clean and new. 3min walk to the nearest bus stop and 10min walking distance to nearest Paya Lebar Mrt, a lot of good food there. There is a convenience store beside the hotel.

title: A disgrace to hospitality service
desc: I checked in my domestic helper at Aqueen Paya Lebar on 8 Jan 2022 for her to serve out her 7-day SHN or quarantine as required by Singapore authorities. I am disappointed at the service. When I got to the reception, there were 3 (or 4) ladies. They knew I was there. There was no other guest checking in or checking out or making enquiries. It’s just me and my two domestic helpers standing in front of them but we were totally transparent to them. They were not eager to greet me nor bother that we were there. In fact, it seemed that we were an intrusion to whatever they were doing. I got a bit angry so I asked them if they were going to check us in. Two of them looked annoyed at my question. Throughout the process not one of them smiled at all. Are the days when the

title: Excellent Choice of Hotel
desc: I was on a trip with my mother so had booked the twin room. The room was clean and we had really great amenities in the room. We took a nap before heading out. The comfort level of the bed was of another level. I was glad the property on parking on site as well. Next morning, we had the perfect start to the day with a good and hearty breakfast with plenty of choices for myself too as I am a vegetarian. I will certainly be back.

title: Nice hotel
desc: Nice hotel during my short business trip.. Thank you. All facilities are clean, service was very good, fast check in and check out, near MRT and plaza. Just need to add sound proof in each room. Overall is nice hotel and worth to booked

title: Feeling Good
desc: Convenient location, just 8 mins walk from the paya lebar mrt. I love the hotel room that was given to me, it is a corner room and i have big part surround by window and views. The room is clean and the bed is super soft and comfortable. The fridge is not cold enough. I couldn't adjust for hot water when i am showering. Turn here and there still cold water. There is a convenient store, located beside the hotel, in the Shell Petrol Station, which sell a lot of things.

title: Nice hotel and good location
desc: Selecting this hotel because its free parking at the basement but was impressed with the set up and quality of bed. good wifi speed. close to SingPost Center mall, within walking distance, not that close but not that far either.

title: From Siberia with love
desc: We chose this hotel and were not mistaken! Clean rooms, linen change every day, very friendly staff. Always ready to help. The location of the hotel is very convenient. The metro is very close, food courts and shops within walking distance. And all this for a fairly reasonable price. I wish all the hotel staff all the very best! Thank you for your hospitality!

title: It was clean and good
desc: I stayed there for more than a week. I can tell that the hotel was clean and smelled nice upon entrance. The receptionists are accomodating and polite. The housekeepers clean the room everyday. They change the towels everyday as well as the bedsheet. The internet connection is stable. The bathroom is quite small. The room itself is not that big, but good enough, considering it is in Singapore. The hotel is nearby the train station, bus station, malls, hawkers and gasoline station. I definitely recommend this hotel.

title: Normal Hotel away from Orchard area
desc: Small Hotel with simple facilities in Singapore. Located just next to Shell Petrol Station, entrance by car is behind the Petrol Station. Breakfast is simple ( nothing upscale ) Room and bathroom is small in size. Hotel is occupied mainly by tourists ( with limited budget ) It is located next to Highway and traffic is quite heavy in the mornings.

title: Comfortable Stay
desc: We booked this hotel through AirAsiaGo mainly because it was located about a 10 min walk from the Sri Sivan Temple where we had to attend a ceremony. We were charged SGD142 w/o breakfast by AirAsiaGo for a one night stay. The room had all the facilities we needed except for the lack of a binder sprayer. Coffee & tea making facilities were provided. Even toothbrushes, toothpaste, shaver & shaving gel were provided. However, the TV only had about 7 channels almost all local. Shopping centres, MRT station and restaurants were all located within a 5 min walk. Taxi ride to Changing Airport toon just 20 mins. We would stay here again on our next visit to Singapore

title: Horrible stay - dirty room
desc: Unpleasant experience here. Room was not cleaned and location is not as good as advertised. Very small room and is very different from the photos. Very noisy as well. Not worth to stay and will never return again.

title: Great Location
desc: Close to MRT for easy of travel to Airport and City. Very clean and comfortable rooms. Staff were all very friendly and helpful. Shopping centre with shops and restaurants within a very short walk. Will definitely stay here again.

title: The Worst Hotel I Ever Stayed In
desc: Considering the higher range price range for its size and location, you would expect a hotel not leave you with an experience of dorm room. Above All!!! The acoustic in this hotel is a disaster. From the room doors shattering sound from the all floor, to the conversations held in the corridor. It’s not only not sound proof to the minimum, the low quality building standard somehow amplifies these sounds. Almost every night I was awaken by slammed doors and people’s conversations from the floor. Further; The hotel room is small. Bathroom is very small and very badly lit. Water pressure is insufficient. The 2 lifts are often not sufficient considering the heavy traffic of student shuttling in it between floors. WiFi internet connectivity is extremely slow. The bandwidth is

title: Good 7 Day stay at Aqueen
desc: I was in Singapore for a conference and stayed at Aqueen Hotel Paya Lebar. This is my 3rd stay there. happy with the service and staff is friendly and attending. I normally get same room. This time i gate same like room in another floor due to other room is occupied. Had breakfast there and it's good. Closer to MRT in walking distance and easy to travel in Singapore.

title: Aqueen Hotel Paya Lebar
desc: That was my 1st ever experienced to stay at this hotel regarding my business trip in Singapore. The Hotel was clean and easy to find since its also nearby with MRT station. But, I was disturbed by noise from people in other rooms. The voice I can heard clearly, and really annoyed my morning. I knew that is something that Hotel cant control, but if you know there is a group that stays at your Hotel, you must check and control the situation. So, it wont disturb any guess who stays around that rooms.

title: A quiet place for some chatting n peaceful rest.
desc: A simple night out for some ladies chat. Room is small but comfy for an impromptu night out. Clean environment, carpark is avaliable and privacy is great. Window/balcony is avaliable to allow ray of light to give us a warm morning feel.

title: Poor customer services and reservation
desc: We have been making reservation for 2 weeks stay for our visitor in June 19 and giving clear instruction that the bill will be settled by the company’s account. However, when my visitor check-in the hotel on the first day, the front office request him to pay for the upfront room charges. That is terrible and lack of communication from staff.

title: Good Response
desc: It's my first staying at Aqueen Hotel Paya Lebar in Geylang Area for 3 nights. I did not expect to stay in this area as I had last time, but after my first day passed, I found this Aqueen hotel was located in very nice and easy access to reach by MRT, Taxi and Bus. Nearby the mall too. But most important thing is the hotel staff's response and care about customers. Thank's to Ms. Rashidah for her hospitality and a guy returning back my wallet which was left at the reception's counter. Thanks guy, I hope I can meet him again in my next trip in SIngapore.

title: Nice hotel
desc: Nice hotel with comparatively small rooms.well prepared breakfast.best thing you can find there is the roof top terrace from where you can enjoy half of the city including marina bay sand.you can stay there

title: Nice and clean hotel in the good location
desc: This is a budget hotel that is quite comfortable in Singapore. The size of a hotel’s room is small, so you need to think further if you want to stay at this hotel with your big family. But the condition of the room is quite clean and comfortable. Coffee, tea, work desks, hair dryer and LED TV are available, and maybe the LED TV are quite large compared to the size of the room. The wifi was good, both in the lobby and in the room. The choices of the Breakfast menu were quite varied and tastes good. For the location, this hotel is not in the center of Singapore, but is very close to the bus stop and also the MRT station, making it easier to travel using public transportation. Overall, this hotel is quite convenient for those who want to travel to Singapore for business or

title: Need more language support
desc: Need Chinese service at Front Service. I can speak some English but I saw some middle-aged guests from China, they didn't speak English, they was asking something, but the front desk cannot understand what they saying...

title: Small room and not clean at all
desc: Room wasn't well maintained and not worth the money at all. Location was way off and takes us a long time to reach the city centre. Room only has very minimum amenities. I have stayed in better hotels with better value in Singapore. Will not come back again.

title: Awesome service and great location
desc: The fact that it’s near to F&B outlets and the MRT station are great. What’s better is it’s less congested staying there while being able to access all amenities. Great service by the staff and cleanliness is fab. Will definitely stay there again.

title: Clean, comfortable stay
desc: During check in, staff was very friendly and polite. Service was very fast and efficient. Room is nice and clean and was also comfortable for my daughter. Toilet was clean and user-friendly for a toddler. The hotel seems very posh and beautiful and is located in a well-lit and convenient area. As it is located near the roads, it didn't feel too quiet and solemn during the night.. As it was our first time choosing this hotel, it was a good choice that we did. It was a really pleasant stay.

title: Value for money staying at Aqueen Hotel
desc: Good and comfortable stay and very conveniently located with respect to both the MRT station and the airport. Staff is helpful and efficient especially good for business travel and conference for small group of people. A good variety of food choices in the shopping mall at walking distance next to the MRT station.

title: Excellent Hotel
desc: The location was perfect, easily accessible from the Changi airport using the MRT. Lots of Restaurants and a mall are all walking distance. Our room was clean, pillows were fluffy and the mattress was firm and comfortable.The staff were friendly, and respectful, and very helpful in giving directions for first time visitors like us.

title: Enjoyable and comfy
desc: Stayed for 4 nights, room was comfy and nice. But downside is the bathroom always get flooded whenever you shower in the bathtub. 5 mins walk to shopping mall and MRT. Ample complimentary parking lots(Basement) but the downside is you have to go to the reception(LVL 1) everytime to collect your complimentary coupon for scanning at the carpark gantry.

title: Good and clean hotel, well located near Paya Lebar MRT
desc: This is a nice off central located hotel. Rooms are small but nice and clean. Location is walking distance to Paya Lebar mrt station. Good for small conferences. If you are a light sleeper then this may not be the place as it can get noisy when there are noisy Tour Groups staying on site.

title: Good place to stay
desc: I would rate 3.5/5 🌟.Nice comfortable room. Morning breakfast buffet was good, they should include boil eggs as well.It is far from city. If traveling for business best place... But for vacation I would suggest Days hotel would be better option in same price.

title: Good for Business Trip
desc: I stay here for my business trip. Very convenient for me. It took 5 mins walk to MRT and shopping mall. Nice staffs and clean room but the bathroom quite small. My hand hit the wall few times during shower.

title: Nice stay in Aqueen Hotel
desc: It a good choice for us to stay during a business trip. But there are some problems. I booked a room with breakfast services, but when I reached the hotel, the reception told me not included the breakfast.... Also, the hotel had some problems on the payment, they did a wrong cost, but they refunded finally.

title: Nice Hotel but small rooms for a family
desc: Had a nice 3 nights stay. My family really liked te cleanliness of hotel, Somehow there was some mess up with my travel company as I had to pay extra for breakfast. Also missed one day breakfast, appreciate if hotel team gives a reminder call to the people who are going to miss.

title: New and good
desc: I was given a complimentary night at this new hotel as part of the Singapore stopover package. Reason I picked this hotel was because it was relatively new compared to the others. What a wise choice it turned out to be. Check in was quick and easy. I was automatically given a complimentary upgrade to the premier room which was great. Also late check out as well. Room was nice and carpeted. Bathroom was bigger than usual with a bathtub. Only drawback was the room lightings which were dim. Only local TV channels were available. I was also offered a welcome drink. Unfortunately, the hotel doesn't have a gym or pool. The hotel is a 5 min walk away to Paya Lebar Square, which is also connected to the MRT station. Just next to the hotel is a Shell petrol station, with a 24hr

title: A fine hotel with great staff and adequate rooms
desc: This hotel suited my needs well, which was for a place to stay during a business trip to Singapore. It's not the Grand Hyatt or Shangri-La, but it's clean and neat and is comfortable and quiet. The breakfast is excellent, with a wide variety of Asian and Western options. Close to a shopping mall and MRT stations.

title: Fit for a Princess
desc: Not really a queen's room but the hotel is clean. The staff are helpful. They're prompt in replying to inquiries. The location is just right. Breakfast was not exactly fit for "royalty" but it was not bad at all. It was a bit pricey for a budget hotel but it was not disappointing. Not for a queen but maybe a princess will be happy.

title: On transit
desc: Was on transit for one night. Booked through SIA stopover. Reception staff was polite and helpful. Room was clean. Air conditioner was facing the bed so you either get the full blast of cold air blowing at your face or sleep in the heat. Someone from the management need to take a shower in the room and see how the water flows onto to the floor all the way to the wash bowl. When checking out, there was the housekeeping trolley blocking the passage to the lift. Had to squeeze through and get the housekeeping staff to move the trolley for me to get my luggage through. Very unwillingly moved it just enough for me to go through. No smile no apologies. Will be informing Singapore Airlines. Will I stay there again? The answer is NO.

title: Good hotel
desc: We stayed on a Singapore Airlines stopover and expected a basic hotel, but were pleasantly surprised. A 3 year old building with large rooms and large bathroom. Only free to air tv channels, but excellent value for money, even if we paid the advertised rate.

title: Not bad for a staycation
desc: Hote location was good and customer service was ok. Hotel facade was ok. Room interior and outlook is good although a bit small. Aircon is powerful. No cable tv though. Since it is a 3 star hote, there is no room service, gym or pool.

title: Good and nice place
desc: Staff are friendly and helpful and room and tiolet very clean and price also good.will recommend to friends we Will come back again for holiday season a very good place to stay with family members too

title: Aqueen Hotel Paya Lebar
desc: Helpful, friendly staff. Short walk to subway station and two shopping centres with food courts. Bus stops at the door.The area is mainly business but, as above, easy to get to interesting places.Included breakfast was good, though espresso coffee costs extra and food was not hot towards the end.

title: Good Location but small room
desc: A convenient place. Near to MRT and shopping mall. Room size consider as small but clean and cosy. Near to MRT station but without noise at night. Just wondering if staff able be more helpful when check in is better.

title: Quiet and cosy as usual
desc: The properties are always clean and cosy, My entry is always from the car park and those places are well kept and clean, a great difference from a lot of hotels, even better than some 5 stars. The room is well maintained, with a great city view from my last stay. A good weekend getaway.

title: Fun holidays
desc: We all friends had a great & wonderful holiday & stay was great. It's a great city & all should go at least once & have a blast. A-Queen is a good hotel, co-operative staff, good ambience, very close to airport.

title: Cosy and Convenient
desc: Well located modern hotel conveniently located 5 minutes from the transport,shopping and eatery hub of Paya Lebar station. Very easy to travel to downtown and bayfront from here Rooms are on the small side,with the wash basin inside the bedroom (superior),so I would suggest taking a larger room if you are traveling as a couple. Tip: Buy a 3 day unlimited MRT pass at the airport and explore!

title: Business hotel with good location and amenities
desc: This is a small hotel which is walking distance from the Paya Lebar MRT station. Its near a gas station and a couple of malls which makes it convenient if you need to buy food or toiletries. The staff (both front desk and housekeeping) are pleasant and helpful. The breakfast buffet was surprisingly good. The rooms are small but well-appointed. Our bathroom had a tub and one of those remote-control bidets (pretty cool). TV only has local channels which was a bummer but the hotel has WiFi anyway.

title: Courteous staff
desc: The place is neat and cosy. Staff is most courteous. They were exceptionally helpful in terms of guest relations and support. I had arrived on a morning flight and they even gave me an early check in!

title: Lovely
desc: It was our honeymoon and we received a lovely gift from the staff and lots of help with anything we needed, rooms are beautiful and clean, area is perfect with amenities very close by, highly recommend aqueen! Thank you

title: Pleasant stay
desc: Stayed here for 2 nights staycation. Check in/out were fast n efficient. Upgraded to Deluxe room and it was spacious enough for me. Modern concept, with toiletries, tea/coffee, safety box, slippers,hairdryer provided in the room.cleanliness of the room is acceptable except that it's quite dusty and there's some funny smell in the bathroom. Lighting could be improve as it is quite dim.Lots of powerpoint which is great. Should have cable tv channels instead of just local channels but since it's a smart tv i can watch movies frm my mobile which i really love since I'm just staying in the room most of the time. There's no water spray next to the wc which is a con for me.Housekeeping was fast when requested for ironing facility.Can't comment abt food as I had food outside. Overall

title: Good convenient hotel
desc: I checked in after midnight. The staff at the reception were not very customer friendly. Greeting was minmal.got tht forms signed etc. and handed over the key to me. That's it. I have to find my way to the room.The lift was dark I could not find the buttons to press. The key has to be held near a sensor to activate the key pad! I could not find it in the dark. Managed to go to the room and opened the door. The room is pitch dark. I had to grope in the dark to insert the key and turn on the lights. Ideally a person from the reception should usher the guest to the room and shown the switches of the room etc. The room is very clean and tidy but compact . No place to keep the bags. No place to hang the clothes! Ideally good for a single person. The bathroom too is small.

title: Nice hotel, friendly staff, good location
desc: Very good location; located very close to an MRT station and on a big road. Good breakfast. Friendly and awesome staffs. Rooms are good quiet, with comfortable beds. Clean, tidy, trendy hotel though swimming pool ans related services are not there. Rent is not too high.

title: The best places to have trully Singapore landscape
desc: I book thia hotels from online travel agents and im so satisfied since my first time arrive, very nice receptionist, comfy room and what great landscape of singapore we can see just from our window, I stay at room number 1007, at 10th floor

title: Stay here only as the absolute last resort
desc: By far the worst hotel I have ever stayed in hands down. Rude staff, no amenities! Wonder if the staff haa been given any training in the basics, feel like thy have been hired.off the streets. We didn't have a choice because this was the oy hotel available in Singapore due to F1 weekend. My advise, go here only if the choice is not having any other place available to go to.

title: Keep it up!
desc: - Very friendly front office staff and very helpful with information on Singapore. smooth check in process as well. - Restaurant staff were very polite and the restaurant has a large variety of food on the breakfast buffet. - Small but very clean rooms and bathroom - nice small balcony in the room and the rooftop has a nice skyline view of the city. - the hotel is well situated.. 1min walk from the adjacent Shell Gas station with a big convenient store, 2min walk from the bus stop and 7min walk to the Paya Lebar MRT station where there are also many food stores and other shops in the mall.

title: So bad so bad
desc: This hotel is a bad bad hotel. The doors are slamming so much so from 5.30 it is impossible to sleep. I booked a non smoking room and I got a smoking room on a smoking floor. The girl in the reception I had the "pleasure" sold me a room without breakfast and when I found out she said: "You did not ask if the room was with breakfirst" Hallo! why should I stay on a hotel if it was with breakfast included. Finally, the people I visited in Singapore told me it was "love" hotel or a 1 hour love hotel. I guess you can figure out what that means for yourself:-) So no choose another hotel!

title: Pleasantly Surprised for such value...
desc: I'm pleasantly surprised for the no frills yet comfortable feel Aqueen has given for this pricing of the room (<$150). All toiletries supplied and room gives a pleasant feel and most important of all, quiet on my floor (7th) throughout the night.Please keep this standard up. Will visit again for a night's good sleep.

title: Great experience
desc: Staff was friendly and helpful, Hotel size is not as small as I thought on those bad review so it's all good for me.(Mind you mine is superior only) Although the design of the washing basin outside in the bathroom is kinda weird in my opinion, But I guess that's just that.

title: Good Service and Great Staffs Courtesy
desc: Good services as overall but just that there was no places foods that really nearby and required to have some walking distance. Room is clean and house keeping performed do a great job for cleaning and tidy up.

title: Good stay
desc: The location is great. It’s near MRT (paya lebar), malls and restaurant. Though the room is a bit small but for me it’s ok because I’m a solo traveler. Complete toiletries. I had a great time spending my 1 night at the hotel.

title: Good
desc: Everything was good, near to MRT station. Rooms were small for family of 3, all other was fine. Breakfast was fine. location was good. service is good. Hotel Restaurant is not open in evening so need to look for other options in evening.

title: Good Hotel with comfortable rooms
desc: great comfortable rooms with hospitable staff. Sad that my trip was too short though. Appreciate the cleanliness of the rooms as well. Have nothing else extra to say because it was a very short trip. .

title: Queen bed small for 3 person
desc: Staff friendly. Room size best, but queen size bed are not suitable for 3 person. Toilet size are small. Location near MRT station and Paya Lebar square. Near hotel have 24 hrs shop at shell station. Food court and supermarket inside Paya Lebar Square.

title: Nice Place to Stay at Singapore
desc: The best things is location good place close to Shopping mall and MRT Paya Lebar. Nice to stay here, but so pitty room not include breakfast. The issued here every morning you'll hear slamming the door many times it start from morning and evening so awful. But overall good, We will back in this hotel.

title: Close to MRT
desc: Stayed for five days. Room was clean and comfortable. Bit of less space. Have nice roof top too. Have good internet connection. Very close to Paya Labar square and Paya Labar MRT Station which have Yellow and Green lines. Staff was friendly and attending. Have TV, electric kettle, safe and cupboard at your disposal. Recommend. From Airport Go to tanah merah and then Paya labar.

title: Great Location, Great Facilities, Great Staff!!!
desc: We booked this hotel for my parent’s first visit to Singapore. One thing we discovered, its underated! It is such a great find! Location: conveniently located near the city, with MRT, shopping malls, groceries and hawkers at a walking distance Rooms/Facilities: the hotel is fairly new, the lobby smells soooooo nice! Its is immacualtely clean esp the rooms, comfortable bed, reasonable room size Staff: ALL are extremely helpful, attentive and warm. We are grateful for granting us an early at no cost. We appreciate the genuine servicr all through out our stay. Thank you Aqueen Paya Lebar Team for a wonderful! Till next time!

title: Singapore trip
desc: Aqueen hotel Paya Lebar, great location close to shopping and MRT. Staff great and very helpful. Rooms not huge but more than sufficient for a stay over with great amenities. Very clean. Will stay again.

title: AQueen PL
desc: A very short stay of 1 night in this hotel, quite happy. The rooms are clean, toilet area is good. Did not have a chance to use the breakfast facilities, but picture look appealing Service of the front office is good

title: perfect for my business purpose
desc: For a business trip in Singapore, where my Customer's Office is nearby the Hotel, this was a perfect hotel choice. The only thing I can remark of, is that I like the air-con at low fan speed, so it should be quiet during my sleep; unfortunately, the air-con makes a kind of rattling noise... not too loud, but it's there to disturb my falling asleep.

title: Good value and Quality
desc: We stayed there for 2 nights had a good experience for the value for what you pay. the rooms are quite small and just enough for 2 people but nevertheless the room had a comfortable bed nice interior finishes as well.

title: Quality Rooms at Reasonable Price
desc: Spent a night a Aqueen Hotel Paya Lebar and could not find any negatives about this hotel. Location is central with convenient access to MRT, Shopping Mall and Convenience Store 7-11. Room was small but clean and comfortable. Shower was hot and powerful and the air-condition was powerful. Would love to stay again soon.

title: Good-sized room with sufficient space
desc: Here for a very brief stay, room well appointed with a tub and rainshower. The toilet, TOTO-made, was well maintained and all its functions were in working order. A good sized room on the 9th floor with an extremely comfortable bed and a simple working desk. Room was clean and tidy. However, the noise from other guests' closing their doors could be heard quite clearly. Other than that, staff was polite and the public spaces in the hotel were clean.

title: Definitely recommended
desc: A very quiet location. Hotel is very conveniently located- one easy train change from Changi Airport and a level, 5 minute walk from Paya Lebar MRT station. Two MRT lines pass through Payer Lebar, giving more choices of direct destinations. Buses are also at Paya Lebar station. Useful shops and eating places at Payer Lebar station, including a SingPost post office open 7 days per week. Check-in was easy. Room was always clean, Breakfast choices were good. Staff were very friendly, and helpful. One of the lobby staff member in particular went to considerable effort on my behalf- multiple phone calls, writing notes and instructions and ordering a car and driver- to solve a difficulty I was having with the post office. Excellent service. Highly recommended, and would

title: Missing Item From Room
desc: My crown(tooth) came loose while I was staying here. I placed it on my bedside table so I could have it re-set once I got an appointment lined up. Housekeeping threw it away and denied it, the manager told me to call the police. I feel that is a bit excessive and I don’t want to get anyone in trouble... I suggested that helping make things right with 1 guest was better than a negative review affecting the decisions of multiple potential guests, but they informed me that the hotel manager already took that into account. I don’t feel this hotel management understands customer service very well. Obviously this most likely won’t happen to you, but if anything does happen, don’t expect a positive outcome. I would look elsewhere if I was you, somewhere that makes things right when

title: Good service and close mrt station good points. Too small room bad point
desc: Good service and close to MRT station is good but room sizes are too small. Breakfast was good. Balcony was seemed to be locked all time. Ramp on entry from main road was too steep. Else everything seemed decent. If not affordable pricing, then this hotel lacks any other special attraction/ thing to attract tourists.

title: Dinner facilities
desc: Dinner facilities should be provided along with vegetarian dishes .which is a normal requirements when any person expects after days tour, Hindi channels be shown on TV so as to provide a relaxed atmosphere to guests

title: Disappointing Experience
desc: The locks in the room are not secured specially the lock in the bathroom. On our second night there was an interruption in the electricity and we had to wait for 30 minutes before the maintenance person came. They said there was a problem with their electric lines and that made the aircon not functioning properly. The room was very hot since the aircon is not functioning well and we had a very hard time sleeping.

title: clean room, friendly staff, great location
desc: I love the staff here, book direct from hotel website will give us early check in and late check out and free upgrade....although the room is abit small but i still love it coz it clean the bed very comfortable. The location is good near the mrt n shopping mall just few minute

title: Nice hotel for business trip
desc: I stayed in for 4 days 3 nights. Due to my advance arrival, they could manage to allow me for early check in, which is very comfortable for me after my delayed flight. First time I entered my room, it was a twin bed room. However, after I asked to the reception to change my room to double bed, they changed it right away. They also provide local simcard because I stayed for more than 2 days. It helps, tho. It is a quite nice hotel, very near to my office which located at Paya Lebar Square, next to Paya Lebar MRT Station. It's a 8 minutes walking distance. Staffs were nice and helpful. Special note to Rashidah (Duty Manager), she was very helpful and attentive to make sure everything get done properly. I think I'm gonna stay in here on my next business visits.

title: Singapore Trip
desc: I stayed there for 11 days The room is a bit small but its clean. house keeping is excellent. The only thing is you can hear people on your room. many nights that a whole bus of people checking in and out that its gets really loud. Breakfast is just ok I wish the breakfast starts earlier or longer. 7 am to 9 am is too crowded sometimes.

title: Good hotel for business travelers
desc: Great location 500m to MRT station. Multiple power sockets (I counted 5!) and a fairly spacious room for the price, by Singapore standards. Breakfast buffet is not lavish but sufficient choices. Professional front office staff. No gym or fitness centre though.

title: Not as per expectation
desc: We were looking for Indian food but the hotel didn’t have any restaurant as well as they didn’t told us that Indian is restaurant was jay across the road. Room was too small also and not comfortable for family if you are looking for extra bed for child.

title: Nice and Comfortable stay
desc: I stayed for 23 nights. I got myself a clean and comfort room even though the room size is kinda small. The receptionist was very helpful. Nice and friendly hotel staffs. The location is near bus stop and Paya Lebar MRT station. Overall it was a nice and comfortable stay. I would love to stay in this hotel again in my next visit to Singapore.

title: Convenient, Comfortable and Corteous
desc: The team is very attentive and courteous. Convenient location near petrol station, 24 hours minimart, department store and MRT. Comfortable accommodation. Generous amenities. Free WiFi. Glad to recommend.

title: My favorite hotel accommodation in Singapore
desc: Aqueen hotel, is going to be my favorite hotel accommodation in Singapore. Great reservation & reception team! Nice location & a lovely interior design which you don't find easily in SG. Really enjoyed my stay in Singapore! Thank you!

title: Stay and service
desc: I along with my wife stayed in Aqueen hotel at Paya Lebar. The hotel is very near to Paya Lebar MRT station. Very convenient. Those who want to see Singapore using only MRT I suggest stay Aqueen Hotel Paya Lebar. The taxi is very costly in Singapore. At times we used to go for sight seeing in the morning come back hotel have a nap and again go in the evening. The hotel staff is very comfortable. House keeping very good. we are pure vegetarians. The chief chef took spl care for our food. The receptionists Sherly, May and Hesh were friendly and guided for our sight seening.

title: I recommend this hotel
desc: This hotel is very nice, room is clean and not too small to stay in as well as going to the hotel is so convenience. It nears to subway around 5 mins walk and nears to bus stop 2 mins walk. I recommend this hotel to everyone if you visit to singapore.

title: Good
desc: Overall everything is good, the only thing to improve is when flush the toilet the sound is very loud and very sharp sound. Also the lighting is too dark, will suggest to change to brighter light bulbs

title: Much less than the little expected
desc: We booked Aqueen for it’s convenient location for specific business. We did not expect more than a decent sleep and basic amenities. But the room was the tiniest we ever stayed. No place to put our luggage, which we kept closed and standing behind the door and we had to move around in order to get in and out of the room. The room was not properly cleaned when we got in and it remained equally very superficially done the next day. The bathroom was equally tiny with the great originality of the sink outside of it. The bed could sleep midgets, so my husband’s feet were hanging out and he is not a huge guy. There was not really space to put our clothes, but in any case we could not put our luggage somewhere to open them. Breakfast was awkward; not for non Asians. There were people

title: Great staff, but room for improvements overall
desc: Overall it is a good hotel, friendly and helpful staff and good location. Petrol station/convenient store right next door. And public transport is just a short distance away. lobby drop-off could be a little bit more prominent as taxis seem to be unsure where to stop. Room lighting is too dark though and room doors close too loudly even if you tried your best to close it softly, can be annoying if you have busy neighbors. Housekeeping could do better too, I stayed 12 days and only have them make up the room twice (by my choice) they only replaced new towels and make the bed but the floor was left dusty. The cafe hours are too short it would be nice if they could do dinner service also... But the food is good and value for money. But when they charge service charges to

title: Good hotel
desc: The hotel with good service and security, near market square, MRT and Bus, support taxi calling, clean floors and elevators 2, go to Marina Bay only 10' for 2$ MRT, can go shopping and having dinner at Paya Lepar square

title: Certificate of Excellence due to good reviews
desc: If your stay involves visit to nearby industrial estate then this is a nice, clean & reasonably priced hotel. Came across several good reviews of this hotel on Tripadvisor before the visit & that is probably the reason why it has been given this batch though it is a relatively new hotel. It is about 10-minute walk from the nearest MRT station (Paya Lebar) which is an interchange station of green old east-west line & newly started yellow circle line. The hotel is also well connected by several buses. It is located on the main road if you approach it by walkway but vehicle access is from behind via Jalan Afifi. Certis Cisco security building is next door and on the main road there is a Shell petrol pump. Upon entrance by a taxi there is reception on the left & guest elevators

title: Wrong choice
desc: Even the taxi driver who took us there from he airport was wandering why why chose this hotel. And he was right. In this area there is nothing much to do. Actually the hotel is located next to a very big gas station (with a small Seven11). The hotel is superficially clean. The rooms are tiny som2 people with 2 dig and 2 small luggage's was impossible to move inside, the bed was short and the reception never replied to any calls. The breakfast was limited and very Asian oriented. The facilities of the hotel, from limited to bad. And the cost per night was. Ore that 200 Singapore dollars. I think, never again

title: Good enough hotel for a tight budget. Hospitality and services could have been better.
desc: I. Arrival: Poor I arrived at Aqueen Paya Lebar hours after the intended check-in as my flight to Singapore is scheduled at night. I am not sure if it is because they are not expecting any more check in that time (8 pm), but it seems that the staff (front desk) does not care about my arrival. It is a good thing that the taxi driver is kind enough to help me unload and bring my luggage up the front of the hotel. The staff only helped me with my luggage only after he saw that I was having trouble with the ramp. The way he helped was by merely pointing out the luggage lift. It would have been better if the staff also volunteered to assist me as I don't know how to use the luggage lift. I would understand if the staff something else to do, but as I recall, there are no guest or

title: Excelent staff
desc: I stay 4 days for bussiness trip, in last day I have early check-out and temporary leaving my luggage, after we going back unfortunately suddenly rain and my cloth become wet, so I asking for shower and hotel give me this complement, the staff really help me so much, name is Leslie, he’s very good response to serve the customer even I has been check out in morning

title: Perfect stay in Singapore
desc: The hotel is located a bit outside of the city center but two subway stations are at less than 10 minutes walk and you can reach the marina in 20 minutes with the subway. You also have a mall with a lot of shops at just 8 minutes walk. The hotel is new and modern, my room was clean and had a nice view on the city through big windows. The size of my room was fine but maybe for 2 persons it will be small. Anyway for such a big city the size was good. The staff was very friendly and helpful.

title: Very muslim friendly!
desc: You only need to walk less than 5 mins to reach nearby mall which has halal food choices and mrt station. If you're feeling lazy, you could just grab convenience stores meal at 7/11 beside the hotel. The room are very nice & pretty spacious, my room had safety deposit box and mini refrigerator which are pretty neat. The cleanliness is top notch either the room & bathroom. Staffs are helpful and friendly.

title: First Time Stay
desc: First time we had tried this hotel as the location was better suited for us. A comfortable and clean hotel to stay. Location is great just near the MRT. Only dislike, pricing is a bit high compared with other hotels found closer to the city. Great hotel to stay for business etc not suited for a holiday stay or families.

title: Good hotel warm staff
desc: I stay here 4 night for bussiness trip, the staff help me very nice, actually my english not so good but their can understand what I say, the other thing as a muslim people all breakfast in aqueen hotel is halal food, so we can eat anything, room also very clean, overall good to stay

title: Nice choice
desc: Good hotel with everything I need. It's 10 minutes from Metro station and there is a shopping mall nearby. Staffs are helpful. Various choices for breakfast. My room is really small that there is no place for my luggage. But it is clean.

title: Not a family hotel
desc: This hotel is very new. It's clean and the staff are efficient. What this hotel is not is a family hotel. It is not designed for families and we ended up with 2 rooms and the rooms were not next to each other. No one helps you with the luggage. The rooms were tiny, we were not able to open up the suitcases properly. If you are a business person travelling on your own then this is a great hotel but not for families, I don't think that we would stay here again

title: Our wedding day
desc: Stayed at this hotel to get ready and change our wedding outfits. Staff was super friendly and helpful and kind. Breakfast was good and the view from the roof was amazing. Room was clean and comfortable. Will definitely recommend to others. It was a pleasant experience.

title: New Hotel with very helpful staff
desc: We spent two days at this hotel. We originally stayed at a different Aqueen Hotel in Lavendar, but moved to this hotel after taking a three day trip to Malacca. The staff at both the Paya Lebar and Lavendar locations were extremely helpful in helping us to arrange transfer of our luggage between the two properties, and luggage storage for the three days we were in Malacca. The rooms were nice and efficient. The location is well situated near a shopping plaza, the MRT, and a more traditional food court. This hotel will certainly be on my list for return visits to Singapore.

title: Very small room
desc: The hotel is clean and staff is fine but the hotel has very small room and bathroom. The room is so small that you will just manage to get in and keep you luggage. MRT metro is 7 to 10 min walking distance from hotel

title: Bad Experience
desc: I was forced to sit in the so called lobby of the Hotel for 3 hours with my Family ( including a 3 yr kid) stating that they have not recieved the payment from my Tour Holiday Company. They even cant arrange a room for me. Moreover you have to pick your own luggage in the Hotel as there are no Bell Boys. No Room Service. Restaurant Team were also very arrogant. They were even not servicing Water on the Table. Overall very very bad experience.

title: Keeps Improving
desc: This place keeps improving every time I go back there. Would like to see further improvements to the sound system for their amazing rooftop function hall. Amazing views up there while you take a break from any ongoing functions.

title: Excellent service and quality.
desc: Everything was perfect. Only one thing i would suggest you to increase the bed length as legs are going out of the bed. Rest everything was amazing. I will happily refer everyone for this. Also had a little concern about breakfast, i think there should be at least one Veg dish to be served. Most of the times people would go for Veg breakfast so.

title: Nice Sweet Hotel in heart of Singapore
desc: It is a small hotel but very nice and sweet. Staff, particularly Darshini at the Front Desk is quite helpful and suggestions given by her were quite helpful during our stay and planning the mode of travel. The hotel rooms are small and are fit for couples only. The restaurant is also good and has a good spread of breakfast. Hotel is near by to the Metro Line and hence is quite well connected on CC Line (Circle Line). It is nearby to MALL and Seven Eleven is a stone throw distance away on the Petrol Pump adjacent to the hotel. Had a very good stay.

title: Thumbs up for toilet!
desc: Rooms is small and clean, but BATHROOM is great! The toilet was thought out carefully and as such, seems like a good reward after a long day of work. Location is near MRT station and food stalls, too.

title: Excellent Hotel
desc: I have a discount from Agoda. This hotel is a cozy place with excellent service and great view. The location is also great, 5 minutes walking to the MRT Station and the shopping mall, 1 minute to the 7-Eleven convenience store. I would come back when I visit Singapore next time!

title: Travel with group
desc: A very good and clean hotel. Location near the Geylang area for you to walk. Breakfast is excellent food. Reception staff has a Vietnamese speaking receptionist that make me so supprise. Singapore StarHub SIM card is also sold here with costing of SGD 15 each but need your passport to buy.

title: Clean rooms and friendly staff
desc: My husband and I stayed here in January during our 3 day trip to Singapore. I really enjoyed it as it was a good price, very clean, has a friendly and helpful staff, and is in a good area. It's a little out of the way of tourist areas, but I like that. It was a very short walk (less than 5 minutes) to the metro, and the nearest metro stop is centrally located so any site you want to see is easily accessible. The only downside is that the room was a little smaller than it seemed in the pictures, but we didn't mind since we got a great night's sleep in the comfy bed and room with blackout drapes.

title: Snug Hotel
desc: Very kindhearted staff and very quickly manage (Thank you for your kindly attention). So nice breakfast and attendance (Give my compliments to the chef). Very relax condition in the room. Shower toilet also so good(It's must item for us!). Our best hotel !!

title: Welcome Stay @ Heart of Singapore
desc: If you are a solo traveler, on a business trip or just two of you, then this is an ideal place to stay in Singapore. Proximity to Paya Lebar MRT (EW and Circle Line) makes local travel convenient. Front Desk team is quick and very helpful. Rooms are small but then you are in Singapore. Overall the rooms are comfortable, very clean and with large LCD screens. I was not comfortable with the room provided when I checked-in but the front desk was quick to help me and the room was changed within no time. Breakfast is large spread and delicious. For the foodies, this property is near to the Singapore's top food street which presents a wide variety cuisine to explore and choose from. The street food is simply awesome... NB : Go for the rooms with balcony to enjoy cool Singapore

title: Another good place to stay
desc: I have a regular hotel everytime I go to SG but this time I tried to experiment with others. Except for the size of the room, everything in this hotel is excellent. The staff, location, amenities, etc. Now I have another hotel in my approved list. The room size is a bit small but still ok for me considering the rate. They have bigger rooms with higher rates.

title: Very small room!
desc: It was OK. Expensive for such a tiny room but it is Singapore! Clean and tidy. Breakfast somewhat lacking in variety and/or quality. Anyway, as per expectations. Staff were helpful overall. OK for short biz trip.

title: Very Good Service
desc: Have no complaints to point out. Paya Labar provided very good service and reasonable price for the service they offered. The hotel room and premises were neat and well maintained. Staff were sensible to the questions.

title: The Friendly Staff of Aqueen Hotel Paya Lebar, Singapore
desc: I would like to commend the friendly service of the hotel staff of Aqueen Hotel in Paya Lebar, Singapore, especially to front desk staffers Joseph, Leslie, Ain, Hesh, Maggie, and Harrison. One Sunday morning, I asked Joseph of the front desk if he knew of any Catholic church nearby. Not only did he give me precise directions to the church, he also printed the mass schedules for me. Thanks to his help, I was able to fulfill my Sunday obligation as a Catholic. I also enjoyed the friendly conversations I had with front desk staffers Leslie, Ain, and Hesh. One day, I crossed paths with Leslie on one of the streets near the hotel, and he greeted me with the same smile as he always does at the hotel. From Ain I learned a little bit about Malaysia, Hesh and I looked at a map of

title: Average place to stay for a short trip
desc: I stayed here for almost a month. king size rooms are very small. They don't provide free breakfast. However rooms are clean and good room service.I suggest to take thisplace if your trip is less than 3to4 days

title: Very good
desc: I like this hotel, special there receptionist May she spoke languages Việt Nam for help me a lot when my language English not good I hope in future I will go to visit my son I will book room in here , the hotel very clearly

title: One good hotel in Singapore
desc: Very good service. Employees are polite and helpful. Needless to say cleanliness of the room and other appliances maintained at very high hygienic standard. Nearby malls and convenient store make my life easier during my stay. Sure, I will choose to stay this hotel again in my next trip to Singapore

title: A decent hotel! Recommended!
desc: One of the reasons we booked this hotel is it's location is near to the Paya Lebar MRT and Mall. Paya Lebar MRT serves two train lines (EW and Circle Line) which was convenient for us. Price is also decent. We only stayed for a night but I really appreciated the stay. The checkin was quick. No porters or bellhops so you have to carry your things up the steps and into the lift to your room. If you have a lot of luggage, expect to sweat a tiny bit. The room was decent sized. I've experienced smaller rooms in Singapore. But I liked that it's clean and the bed so comfy and the facility well maintained. We were only a couple and I don't recommend it for families though, it might be a tad small for children running around. All in all, I like this hotel. Location, Price and a nice

title: Welcoming stay
desc: We had a one night lay over in Singapore and enjoyed our stay at Aqueen Hotel near Paya Lebar station. The staff was welcoming and professional. As it was our first stay we were upgraded to a better room, which was nice. As usual in Singapore, the rooms are relatively small, but very clean room and comfortable bed. The hotel itself is located about a 10 minute walk from Paya Lebar station, which has plenty of cafes and restaurants.

title: Great Stay
desc: While the rest of my son's team stayed at another hotel, my son and I were incredibly happy to stay at Aqueen. It was perfect for the 2 of us, breakfast was good, location easy, and the staff was incredibly helpful and attentive. I would definitely stay here again.

title: Excellent clean hotel , straight forward friendly staff , no porters ,no tips
desc: stayed 4 nights. good clean hotel.. easy access to MRT station , BUS stop and paya lebar square.. highly professional staff no porters. Near my type hotel. calm and quite place. good breakfast at 2nd floor. Nearly 20% of taxes may added to room charges. Good for travelers. Need to increase the level of sound proofing little more for the rooms.

title: Nice quiet and small hotel
desc: Nice hotel and very friendly staff. Room might be small for others and specially the shower area. Breakfast buffet is average. Starts at 7PM so you cannot eat if you have an early meeting. 8mins walk from Paya Lebar station so need to walk a little bit in order to reach the place

title: Business Trip
desc: Great location for business. One minute away from the learning center and the mall. Staff are helpful. Went for a run across the street. Safe location. Right next to shell gas station if you need any last minute convenience shopping.

title: Amazing experience.
desc: By far, the best service provided to me. It was my parents 25th anniversary during my stay here. The staff was really very helpful. Aqueen upgraded their room and when we reached the hotel it was beautifully decorated. They also ordered a cake from my side. The staff is really polite and ready to help in a moment's notice. Loved my stay here. Thanks for the wonderful experience.

title: Home for 3 weeks
desc: Stayed in Aqueen Hotel, Paya Lebar for 3 weeks. It is not like other hotels when it comes to size but the service and the rooms are quite good. I had a room with a balcony and a nice view. The only thing that they can improve more on is that they should put room service and it would be perfect if they have a pool.

title: Bad impression
desc: First housekeeper mistakenly taken my towel together with their soil linens while housekeeper was cleaning my room. Second next day forgot to put me floor mat for the toilet yet even i put the empty box of tissue but still left it empty there so next day i must opened the box for them to let them see its empty. Third I've left my stuffs there when i was checked out ; yet they couldn't found my things. This is so sad.

title: nice hotel for solo or business stay
desc: we stay for 2 night on may 7-9. overall the hotel is very nice. the room is clean, the staffs are nice. breakfast is ok, enough variety from light one like soup and salad to bread and curry and fried rice. few minutes walk to mrt paya lebar and paya lebar square which have halal cantine for lunch or dinner. small stores, some bakery and even a small giant supermarket. but as i mention earlier, its nice hotel for solo or business stay, not for family. because the standard room is small about 13 sqm. we dont have any complain though because we do have research in advanced about the size of the room. after my husband work is done we move to other hotel for bigger rooms because we have our daughter with us😊.

title: Good and New hotel
desc: The hotel condition are new and good. Located near the Payar Lebar MRT station. It's also near to PIE express way to Changi airport. The food at Hotel restaurant tasty . Staff in this hotel all are friendly and helpful.

title: Nice!!!!!
desc: The rooms are so nice with warmly&helpful service, it is very convenient cause it is quite near the MRT Station. In Singapore,this hotel are the best for me. Surely, i will be here if i come back to Singapore

title: convenient place to stay
desc: Recomended place to stay, near to MRT and paya lebar square, lots of halal food nearby and last but not least, the hotel location is behind cisco and next to petrol station where you can find convinient store open 24x7!

title: Nice hotel and simple
desc: Stay in this hotel since i have a meeting in HQ office near this hotel, the hotel is okay, room is nice, not to big, but comfy, also offering free wifi, this is good, lot of power socket inside the room, suitable for business travellers. The bathroom is simple but nice. Love their room arrangment. Also offering welcome drink that can be taken afternoon. But for the breakfast i must say, don't have many option. I give ok to the breakfast, and reminder, they not allowed any luggage inside the restaurant, so leave it in the room or put it in the lobby. Have a nice stay

title: Plessant Moments.
desc: Aqueen, Hotel was nice. very neat and clean. Its location is very beautiful . Front office was very friendly. And madam May ,Hesh, and Mr.Joseph, was so kind to us. They made our trip wonderful. thanks to all.

title: BEST HOTEL, NEAR TO MRT/MALL/CONVENIENCE STORE
desc: The service was really good! Breakfast menu for 8 days were really delicious! Clean and tidy. Definitely a worth-it stay! Spacious room, perfect for single or couples. Easy access to MRT and near to Paya Lebar Square! <3

title: Simply amazing
desc: I had the chance to stay in this hotel and I have to say it is absolutely nice. It is a new hotel as I discovered form reception and you can tell by walking around the common areas. The location was perfect for me. Close to the MRT you can reach the city centre in 15 minutes. If you are shopping addicted like me you will also have different shops around at a short walking distance. The room was very clean. The staff was very patient with all my requests about what to see and what to do during my short stay and they could have been nicer. I enjoyed my time there and will defintely go back if I found myself in Singapore again.

title: Convenient hotel
desc: Courteous staff, quiet vicinity, 8 mins walking distance to shopping center & mrt. Highly recommended, convenient to airport. Walking distance to Sims Ave & Geylang for authentic food, City Plaza for wholesale shopping

title: Very pleasant
desc: I stayed in a double room which was very clean and well-air conditioned. Tea, coffee and a safe provided and the room was a reasonable size. Nice staff and good location 10 mins walk to the Paya Lebar metro station, a convenient ride away from the city centre.

title: Comfortable Room for Solo Traveller
desc: Very comfortable room, perfect for one person travelling with one suitcase; the standard rooms might be a little small for more than one person. The facilities are very nice: TV, clean bathrooms, comfortable bed. The rooms on the higher floors have great views of the city.

title: quite good hotel
desc: A very good location, friendly and helping staff, quite small but neat rooms. very near to mrt station and shopping mall paya lebar square. good enough for small stay. breakfast moderately ok. Enjoyed .

title: December Singapore trip
desc: Hotel has a primary location with a mall and super store at walking distance, not very far from airport and other main attractions of singapore. Hotel staff were very welcoming and cordial, breakfast served was good. Good Room with all amenities required but slightly smaller in size to accommodate a family. Over all ok only room size was a problem.

title: Good Hotel Located at a central place.
desc: I enjoyed the stay At Aqueen Hotel Paya Labar. It is situated near the Paya Lebar Square and has an MRT line. From here you can travel to all major sightseeing venues in Singapore. The Hotel is Neat and clean and the staff is very good towards customers.

title: Worth Staying
desc: Nice clean and well maintained hotel. Staff was supportive. Prefer staying again as it is close to Changi airport.. My stay was purely for business purpose. I will recommend this hotels to other travelers too.

title: Business trip
desc: Nice, comfortable, and quiet. Room is clean, good air conditioning, and good wifi connection. Not to far from airport, hotel location is very close to MRT stations, near a shopping mall, and very easy to find food around the hotel.

title: Comfy hotel near to amenities
desc: Friendly staff. Comfy room. Breakfast is average. Bathroom lights could be brighter. I felt it was too dim. Very near MRT, Payar Lebar mall and halal eating food court is just 5 minutes walk. 7-11 is just next door. Good location. Convenient.

title: Good for business travelers
desc: Warm and helpful staff. Excellent breakfast spread. Rooms are a bit small, but nothing to complain about. Room has two bottles of water, coffe and tea satchets, electric kettle, smart led tv, wardrobe with electronic safe, mini refrigerator, hair dryer, slippers. Ironing board available on request. Basic toiletries provided. No bidet spray in toilet. Water in bathroom would barely pass as lukewarm. Clean linen and towels.

title: reasonable price, great location, modern design.
desc: small room with very modern design and comfortable bed. excellent and efficient service - especially on the front desk/ reception. great location - a short walk from paya lebar MRT. near a few bus stop with good routes.

title: Hotel is good for short business trip
desc: The hotel is near to MRT station with reasonable price. With staffs warmly welcome, room is clean with window. Overall is value for money and suitable for last minute booking. I would recommend this hotel for short business trips.

title: Very nice hotel
desc: Staff is very friendly and supportive. Nice location, mrt and and shopping complex are very nearby. Rooms are very clean and bed size is also comfortable. Value for money. Breakfast is also good and tasty.

title: Nice hotel but not staffed properly
desc: When we arrived both driveways were blocked. We had to unload the luggage a distance from the hotel. I asked for help. There were four young ladies at the front desk. Only one came out to help and took the smallest bag. This hotel should hire someone to assit with luggage.

title: Good to Stay
desc: Hi There, The Hotel was good service was good! Only the check-out service taking too long at the counter, only one staff was there during that time. Overall it was a good place to stay. I will come again next time. Thanks & regards, Faris

title: the best place if you wanna check in early
desc: the staff all is very nice.im their regular customer.they let me check in early due to my circumstances.its a hotel well made for a couple with handicap partner.im very satisfied with their service.will visit there soon.my favourite hotel of all.

title: Recommended!
desc: We were treated so well during our stay at this hotel. It is easy to spot the building from the MRT station. The services were great i.e. the check in and check out processes did not take long and the staff are friendly.

title: Good stay, clean, excellent service, - in location
desc: Good stay but hard to find good food. Mrt is near but not a short journey to any of Sg main attraction. Convenient for business trip when you have office in the Ubi area or surrounding Paya Lebar district

title: A worthwhile stay
desc: Its a good place to stay during my business trip the room and is clean and employees are honest.. but there is one thing that i relly notice is this one employee who does not knoww how to smile grumpy from the beginning to the end...did not get his name but he wears a blazer all the time. tuesday morning he is at the counter and i ask for a taxi politely and he never confirmed to me if i got one good thing JASPER was there to get me one...the employee who impacts may stay a lot is JASPER and LESLIE two dependable guys that will get out of his way to assist a customer and that is what i call SERVICE...thank you guys and will be sure be back in SG and sure i will stay at AQUEEN PAYA LEBAR see you soon more power

title: About Business Trip for 2 weeks
desc: Hotel service was overall good! It was very good for welcome service for me. But I felt the small size for shower booth at Premier room in this time. And it had better to provide the yogurt in breakfast.

title: Good location
desc: Services and Location is good, near shopping center and met, and room is clean. I Iike the wifi, is fast and suitable for business trip, but room is a bit small. Willl consider come back again for next business trip.

title: Business
desc: We would like to say a big thank you to all the staffs at Aqueen Paya Lebar. Especially Leslie, Hesh , Shirley and many more that make our stay warm and pleasant. Thank you guys! Sorry if we had forgotten to mention your names.

title: Better than expected!
desc: We had a pleasant stay at Aqueen Paya Lebar! The room is a bit small but modern, clean and well-equipped. The hotel itself is within walking distance to Paya Lebar MRT, convenience store and a shopping mall. The staff was very efficient in assisting us with booking taxi in advance as well as check-in/ check-out. Aqueen Paya Lebar is easily one of the best value hotels in Singapore!

title: Good Place
desc: Indeed a good place to stay. Very nice staff and service. We will always go back in this hotel whenever we visit Singapore. One thing for improvement would be TV channels, its very limited. Hopefully they'll have more so you can chose what to watch if you just want to stay in the hotel

title: Enjoyable stay!
desc: The service at Front desk was excellence. Staff was very attentive and served with passion. Checked in and out was fast and efficient. Room design is modern and chic. A modern-technology Toilet bowl come with warm seat feature. Room was very clean and comfortable.

title: very satisfy
desc: very good location, quiet a lot restaurants nearby, shopping mall neaby, MRT station just few minutes walk. comfortable bed. spacious room, and clean. friendly staffs. fast wifi connection. very near airport.

title: nice
desc: nicely located hotel. near to changi airport as well as easily approachable from main city. good ambience, clean. Staff of hotel was caring. love to have another visit. room size of double room was small

title: Value for money, great location.
desc: Great location, easy access to Changi Airport, Orchard Road, Marina Bay. Few places in Singapore could be described as value for money --- this is one hotel. Hotel could use a health club, a couple of treadmills and a resistance training machine. Will I come back - yes!

title: Great location, good hotel
desc: The hotel is in a fabulous location. 5 minute walk to paya lebar square and mrt. The hotel is new and as a result is very clean. I stayed in the cheapest room and it was small but adequate for what I needed. Beds were very comfortable.

title: The hotel's service is very good.
desc: The hotel is very new.There is a gas station next to the hotel.A few minutes walking distance to reach the bus stop and subway station. Not far from the hotel, there are also large shopping mall is convenient to eat.In the room have a French window, can enjoy the beautiful scenery outside.The only fly in the ointment is the bed is a little small.Desk clerk patient thoughtful, also can speak Chinese.Overall this is a high performance of the hotel.

title: Very Good Location
desc: The accomodation was awesome. Nice room, comfortable bed and very close to MTR. There is also Paya Lebar Square Mall and 7-11 very near. I would recommend staying here again on my next business visit in SG.

title: MY STAY AT HOTEL AQUEEN PAYA LEBAR, SINGAPORE
desc: Quick check-in by a nice smiling person at reception who there and then arranged for packed breakfast two days later when i had to board aircraft and therefore leave early-and further cross-checked with me as I happened to be a strict vegetarian. Room was neat, clean and quiet. I was given password for Wi-Fi on my arrival itself. Breakfast was good, and the staff in the dining hall was nice. I was provided additional tea-bag / coffee and water bottle promptly. My check-out from the hotel was quick /fast and as promised packed breakfast was provided to me at 530 AM before I checked out and departed for my return journey.

title: Manner, Air conditioner
desc: Many Korean tourists were very noisy, selfish behavior in the cafe restaurant, it was very terrible please notify them to follow universal public manner. Air conditioner temperature is too cold in the building.

title: not worth the money
desc: Born in Singapore, first trip back in 60yrs, booked a supreme delux dble room, um more like a single room with double queen bed put in, as it was so cramped. Left a shirt behind, as I had left the country got my friend to phone them up to go and collect it, was told nothing had been found. Rubbish as I had left it in the wardrobe hanging up, another cal made, of sorry we have found it, so what about the checks made on cleaning the room. Shower was hard to figure out and water was cold at night, tepid during the day.

title: Great business trip hotel
